sentences.sentence: "He smiles deviously." Your colleagues may mention this in the media.
sentences.translation: 他诡异的笑道，“你的同事搞不好会向媒体题到这件事情的。”

sentences.sentence: This was very limited but deviously powerful magic, for it enabled her to correct a just-made mistake.
sentences.translation: 时间虽然非常有限，但却是十分强大的魔法。

sentences.sentence: An action calculated to frustrate an opponent or gain an advantage indirectly or deviously; a maneuver.
